recipe.title: Mixed Green Salad
ingredients: 12 cups bite-size pieces of assorted greens, such as arugula, watercress, and red- and green- leafed lettuces, rinsed and spun dry
freshly ground black pepper to taste
instructions: In a salad bowl toss the greens with the parsley, drizzle the salad with the oil, and toss it well. Sprinkle the salad with the salt, the pepper, and the lemon juice and toss it well.
